Question.Subject: Best browser for Windows Vista SP2?
Question.Content:
Only based on safety, speed, and stability.
I don't care about customization or the appearance.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
There is quite a range of browsers that would suit your needs. I personally use Chrome first and Firefox second though Opera, and Safari are both fine. And i believe IE8 is safe too.
Chrome: http://www.google.com/chrome Firefox: http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/firefox.html Opera: http://www.opera.com/ Safari: http://www.apple.com/safari/

Answer.Content: I always say firefox first, google chrome second
Any one would do you can have as many browsers as you want installed on your computer I have both IE8 and firefox.

There is quite a range of browsers that would suit your needs. I personally use Chrome first and Firefox second though Opera, and Safari are both fine. And i believe IE8 is safe too.
Chrome: http://www.google.com/chrome Firefox: http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/firefox.html Opera: http://www.opera.com/ Safari: http://www.apple.com/safari/

Try the newly released opera 10.5! It rocks! its the fastest! http://www.opera.com/
DONT USE CHROME.its all hype :(
